9. Is Congress being asked to appropriate funds over which it has
no control?
No. The Congress has the responsibility of controlling the
collection and disposition of all funds raised through tax
revenues. The proposed Public Broadcasting Corporation would
be a quasi-government agency and does not modify that ultimate
control, but removes the actual operation of the Corporation
from immediate government supervision so as to preclude other
forms of control over program and operation.
